appetizers.name: Veggie Tray
appetizers.description: A plate of vegetables neatly arranged with a side of ranch dressing, perfect healthy nibbles for when you are mindlessly coding.

appetizers.name: Chips and Salsa
appetizers.description: Tortilla chips served with your choice of heat of salsa, for a spicier coding experience, choose the hot salsa.

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: A classic turkey sandwich with just enough nutrition to keep you focused.

cold sandwiches.name: The Club
cold sandwiches.description: A sandwich with all the best ingredients that will help you keep working.

hot sandwiches.name: The Hot Chicken
hot sandwiches.description: A hot and juicy chicken sandwich with barbecue sauce that will keep you zinging away at your code.'

hot sandwiches.name: The Meatball
hot sandwiches.description: A classic meatball sub that will satisfy your coding craving.

desserts.name: Brownie
desserts.description: A basic brownie that will hit the sweet spot to hit all the basics of your programming.

desserts.name: Sugar Cookie
desserts.description: A sweet cookie that will satisfy your sweet craving to continue focusing.

drinks.name: Code Coke
drinks.description: A flavored coke with just the right sweetness and caffeine to code.

drinks.name: Milk
drinks.description: An ice cold glass of milk that does a body good for your programming endeavors.
